name: Singularity Space Survivor
description:
This game is about jumping from one planet to another to escape from a black hole. The player has 3 input options: moving left/right (done using WASD or the arrow keys) around the planets,  and also jumping (using the space bar).

The game was programmed by myself using the Godot game engine for the LMOB Beginner's Game Jam #28. Art assets were made by Aaron Randell and myself using GIMP. Didn't have time to implement music or sound effects, unfortunately.

In the original submission, I forgot to include the .pck file, but this version does include it now, so it should work (although it won't be in time for the game jam, unfortunately).
